name: symbio-exchange-server
description: Backend for Symbio-Exchange â€” raw SQL with better-sqlite3

scripts.demo-queries: sqlite3 database.sqlite "SELECT 'DEMO: Fly Ash Matches'; SELECT d.material_name, u.name as buyer FROM listings d JOIN users u ON u.id = d.user_id WHERE d.type = 'DEMAND' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM acceptance_criteria ac JOIN batch_composition mc ON mc.chem_id = ac.chem_id AND mc.listing_id = 1 WHERE ac.listing_id = d.id AND (ac.min_percentage IS NULL OR mc.percentage >= ac.min_percentage) AND (ac.max_percentage IS NULL OR mc.percentage <= ac.max_percentage));"
